page.title: 18BUILDING CONTRACTOR LIMAVADY
page.content: Blair and Feeney are a long established, highly respected firm of {building contractors. }The factory is situated on the Seacoast Road, Limavady, next to the Corndale Livery Kennels and Stables. They service all around the North West of the province including large towns like Coleraine and Londonderry. However, most of their work is done locally in the Roe Valley area. Blair and Feeney do{house improvements and general{house repairs.}There are forty people working for Blair and Feeney, all men except two or three secretaries. One of the secretaries, Katherine Miller, attended Limavady High School until the year 1984. There are over twenty yard workers who are making the products and loading and unloading lorries. The other employees work on building sites.
